description: Numbers n such that 70*R_n + 9 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (7*10^(n+1)+11)/9 is prime.
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 77...779.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[70*(10^n - 1)/9 + 9], Print[n]], {n, 0, 5000}]Select[Range[700], PrimeQ[(7 10^(# + 1) + 11) / 9] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..400] |  IsPrime((7*10^(n+1)+11) div 9)];  _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2014
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2000
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 01 2008
a(9) derived from A098089 by _Robert Price_, Nov 22 2014
